articles.title: Only three Android devices made the '10 best-selling phones of 2021' list - TechSpot
articles.description: Counterpoint Research published its list of the best-selling smartphones of 2021, and it’s good news for Apple. iPhones take up seven of the ten spots on the...
articles.content: Why it matters: What do you think was the most popular phone worldwide in 2021? If you said it was from Apple, youd be right. In fact, the five best-sellers were all iPhones on a list dominated by Cu… [+1578 chars]
